metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1246 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer overflow in the DBD::mysql module before 4.037 for Perl allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors related to an error message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbd-mysql-perl - 4.033-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.033-1ubuntu0.1').
